lookup.name: lookup
lookup.description: Returns a record from a subquery (the lookup table) producing a match between a field in the source table (sourceField) and a field in the lookup table (lookupField).

parameters.name: sourceField
parameters.description: The matching field in the source table (left side).

parameters.name: lookupField
parameters.description: The matching field in the lookup table (right side).

parameters.name: executionOrder
parameters.description: Defines which side of the join will be executed first. The allowed values are auto, leftFirst, rightFirst. The default value is auto.

lookup.longDescription: In a case, where more than one match is produced in the lookup table, only the first matching record of the lookup table is returned. When the key values in the source and lookup table are both null, corresponding records aren't matched.
